channel.title: Comments on: Is ARM a wrong thing to do?

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I decided to leave ARM and embedded Linux there untouched, at least for sometime - I need more time focus on PPCam project, and once I finish it I will try to see what I can do on embedded system.
item.content:encoded: I decided to leave ARM and embedded Linux there untouched, at least for sometime – I need more time focus on PPCam project, and once I finish it I will try to see what I can do on embedded system.
